thread.section_title: Hotel le Tourville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: This will be our Paris Home!
thread.title_full: This will be our Paris Home! - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Erica M
title: This will be our Paris Home!
text: AMAZING HOTEL - Euro-chic and clean. We loved it so much - The location was so easy and the staff was so friendly. Quick access to Eiffel Tower, Metro, Restaurants, quaint streets - everything we could have asked for. The Hotel was tiny, but we loved that too. They always had coffee and a little snack in the lobby, the concierge was BEYOND nice - he showed us how to use the metro, gave us little tips and more. We will stay there again next time.
